# GET /v1/appStoreVersions/{id}/relationships/ageRatingDeclaration | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ App Store Connect API ](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi)

-  GET /v1/appStoreVersions/{id}/relationships/ageRatingDeclaration 

Web Service Endpoint# GET /v1/appStoreVersions/{id}/relationships/ageRatingDeclaration

App Store Connect API## [URL](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appStoreVersions-_id_-relationships-ageRatingDeclaration#url)



```
GET https://api.appstoreconnect.apple.com/v1/appStoreVersions/{id}/relationships/ageRatingDeclaration
```

## [Path Parameters](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appStoreVersions-_id_-relationships-ageRatingDeclaration#path-parameters)

`id``string` (Required)
